job_description: • Own the design of battery or power distribution subsystems, including component selection, schematic design, and PCB layoutBring up and validate custom PCBAs for battery and charger systemsDevelop and execute test plans to verify requirements, derisk design changes, and ensure long-term reliabilityDesign wiring harnesses and cables, including connector selection, wire specifications, and documentation Bachelor’s or higher degree in Electrical Engineering or related fieldHands-on experience with PCB design and bring-upStrong understanding of power electronics, batteries, or power distribution systemsExperience designing wiring harnesses and cables for electromechanical systemsTrack record of building, testing, and iterating on custom hardware Take ownership of battery and charger systems powering next-generation humanoid robotsPrototype and refine high-performance electronics with direct impact on product reliabilityPush the boundaries of robotic power systems as we scale from R&D to full manufacturing.
